about_the_game:
You stood by the cliff and stared at the Qurate abyss. The wind blows across your ears and blows your hair. At this moment, you feel that you are the most brave person in the world.

Gameplay:

This is a VR rock climbing simulation game, you can experience the real rock climbing experience in virtual reality. In the game, you need to overcome all kinds of difficulties and challenge your limits. Players need to grab each protrusion on the mountain wall through the handle to enter the feasibility. During the game, you will continue to look up to observe the surrounding environment in order to better plan climbing routes.



And when you look up, you may encounter some sudden attacks. This is a egg in the game. When you look up and observe, a bird will fly over and will send you a "gift". This egg does not affect the game process, but it will make your climbing journey more interesting.



In addition to this egg, there are other surprises in the game waiting for you. If you are a climbing enthusiast, then this game will definitely make you want to stop.



The VR rock climbing simulation game allows you to experience the real rock climbing experience in virtual reality. There are various rock walls, cliffs and ropes in the game, so that you can overcome various difficulties and challenge your limits. And that will suddenly attack your bird shit when you look up and observe, making your climbing journey full of surprises. Come and experience it!

Game operation:

The handle in the perspective of the handle moves
The handle trigger key controls the climbing position lock

name: VR Rock Climbing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: You stood by the cliff and stared at the Qurate abyss. The wind blows across your ears and blows your hair. At this moment, you feel that you are the most brave person in the world.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
